
\documentclass[border={10pt 30pt 150pt 0pt},varwidth]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsmath}
\usepackage{tikz-cd,tikz-3dplot} 
\usetikzlibrary{calc,intersections,through,backgrounds,decorations.pathmorphing, decorations.shapes,decorations.markings,patterns}
%include other needed packages here   

\DeclareMathOperator{\Flagd}{\operatorname{Flag}_{d}}
\DeclareMathOperator{\Flagdstr}{\operatorname{Flag}_{d,\operatorname{str}}}
\newcommand{\Gr}{\operatorname{Gr}}
\newcommand{\Grr}{\operatorname{Gr}}
\newcommand{\Gralg}[1]{\operatorname{Gr}^{#1}}
\newcommand{\Grq}{\operatorname{Gr}^{KQ}}
\newcommand{\Flag}[1]{\operatorname{Flag}_{#1}}
\newcommand{\Flagstr}[1]{\operatorname{Flag}_{#1,\operatorname{str}}}
\makeatletter
\newcommand\xleftrightarrow[2][]{%
  \ext@arrow 9999{\longleftrightarrowfill@}{#1}{#2}}
\newcommand\longleftrightarrowfill@{%
  \arrowfill@\leftarrow\relbar\rightarrow}
\makeatother
\begin{document}
$$
\left\{
% https://q.uiver.app/?
\begin{tikzcd}[row sep={15mm,between origins},column sep={13mm,between origins},labl/.style={rotate=90,pos=0.5}]
	{X\!\!:} &[-6mm] {X_x} & {X_y} & {X_z} & {X_w} \\
	{X_3\!:} & {X_{3x}} & {X_{3y}} & {X_{3z}} & {X_{3w}} \\
	{X_2\!:} & {X_{2x}} & {X_{2y}} & {X_{2z}} & {X_{2w}} \\
	{X_1\!:} & {X_{1x}} & {X_{1y}} & {X_{1z}} & {X_{1w}}
	\arrow[from=2-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow[from=3-2, to=3-3]
	\arrow[from=4-2, to=4-3]
	\arrow[from=4-4, to=4-3]
	\arrow[from=3-4, to=3-3]
	\arrow[from=2-4, to=2-3]
	\arrow[from=2-4, to=2-5]
	\arrow[from=3-4, to=3-5]
	\arrow[from=4-4, to=4-5]
	\arrow["\mbox{\huge$\subseteq$}"{description,labl}, shift right=5, draw=none, from=2-3, to=1-3]
	\arrow[from=1-2, to=1-3]
	\arrow[from=1-4, to=1-3]
	\arrow[from=1-4, to=1-5]
	\arrow["\mbox{\huge$\subseteq$}"{description,labl}, shift right=5, draw=none, from=3-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow["\mbox{\huge$\subseteq$}"{description,labl}, shift right=5, draw=none, from=4-3, to=3-3]
\end{tikzcd}
\middle|
\,x.X_{k+1} \subseteq X_k
\right\}
\xleftrightarrow{\hspace{1.4cm}}\left\{
% https://q.uiver.app/?
\begin{tikzcd}[row sep={12mm,between origins},column sep={14mm,between origins},labl/.style={rotate=90,pos=0.5}]
	&[-5mm] {X_x} & {X_y} & {X_z} & {X_w} \\
	{\Phi(X)\!:} & {X_x} & {X_y} & {X_z} & {X_w} \\
	& {X_x} & {X_y} & {X_z} & {X_w} \\
	& {X_{3x}} & {X_{3y}} & {X_{3z}} & {X_{3w}} \\
	{} & {X_{2x}} & {X_{2y}} & {X_{2z}} & {X_{2w}} \\
	& {X_{1x}} & {X_{1y}} & {X_{1z}} & {X_{1w}}
	\arrow[from=6-5, to=5-5]
	\arrow[from=5-5, to=4-5]
	\arrow[from=5-4, to=4-4]
	\arrow[from=6-4, to=5-4]
	\arrow[from=6-3, to=5-3]
	\arrow[from=5-3, to=4-3]
	\arrow[from=5-2, to=4-2]
	\arrow[from=6-2, to=5-2]
	\arrow["\mbox{\huge$\subseteq$}"{description,labl}, shift right=5, draw=none, from=4-3, to=3-3]
	\arrow[from=3-2, to=2-2]
	\arrow[from=2-2, to=1-2]
	\arrow[from=3-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow[from=2-3, to=1-3]
	\arrow[from=2-4, to=1-4]
	\arrow[from=3-4, to=2-4]
	\arrow[from=3-5, to=2-5]
	\arrow[from=2-5, to=1-5]
	\arrow[from=2-2, to=3-3]
	\arrow[from=1-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow[from=1-4, to=2-3]
	\arrow[from=2-4, to=3-3]
	\arrow[from=2-4, to=3-5]
	\arrow[from=1-4, to=2-5]
	\arrow[from=4-2, to=5-3]
	\arrow[from=5-2, to=6-3]
	\arrow[from=4-4, to=5-3]
	\arrow[from=5-4, to=6-3]
	\arrow[from=4-4, to=5-5]
	\arrow[from=5-4, to=6-5]
\end{tikzcd}
\right\}
$$
$\hspace{3.3cm}\Flagstr{3}(X) \hspace{3cm} \xleftrightarrow{\hspace{1.4cm}} \hspace{2.5cm} \Gralg{R_{3,\operatorname{str}}}(\Phi(X))\hspace{-10cm}$
\end{document}
